name: A Soul's Journey (aFlyerz, PouPou, Orilexx, nicbill10, quentin0133, Piesanslit)
name_original: A Soul's Journey (aFlyerz, PouPou, Orilexx, nicbill10, quentin0133, Piesanslit)
description:
This game was made during our study year at UQAC

You play as a ghostly fox who doesn't know why he is in the game, again lazy developers ... With the help of Widle, a rabbit that the fox does not know, you will have to find where the developers have hidden the script of the game.

  • Take the strength of your enemies and use it against them
  • Fight with dark bosses, why they are dark ?  We don't know
  • A game full of humor
  • Take on the challenges and accomplish all the achievements

Made by :

Antonin De Almeida
Quentin Yahia
Téo Martin
Alexandre Duplay
Gabriel Ouellet
Nicolas Bilodeau
